title: Who invented the telephone, and what was the technology used? - Quora

response.answer_text: Charles Bourseul, Innocenzo Manzetti, Antonio Meucci, Johann Philipp Reis, Alexander Graham Bell, and Elisha Gray were credited with inventing the Telephone. Bells first transmitter was a liquid transmitter using water/acid solution 1876  Bell making the first long distance call Chicago to New York in 1892
